submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, n: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ans = Counter([abs(n[i]-n[-1-i]) for i in range(len(n)//2)])
        a = sorted([abs(n[i]-n[-1-i])+max(min(n[i],n[-1-i]),k-max(n[i],n[-1-i])) for i in range(len(n)//2)])
        # print(ans)
        # print(a)
        r = inf
        for i in ans:
            # print(i,bisect_left(a,i-1)*2)
            r = min(r,(len(n) - ans[i]*2 - bisect_left(a,i)*2)//2 + bisect_left(a,i)*2 )
        return r
